title: Horse talk
creator_credit: Paul Barralet and Paul Barralet Productions
brief_description: The various ways in which the horse still plays an active part in British life. Dray horses, horses on the farm, thoroughbreds and ponies for sport, and many others. The ceremonial horse being trained for the intricate pattern of ancient customs and great occasions which are part of Britain’s tradition. Commentary by James McKechnie.
